text:
ALLEN MILLER
602 GLADSTONE STREET PULLMAN, WASHINGTON 99163
September 29, 1968
Mr. Robert A. Mott, Director
National Educational Radio
1346 Connecticut Avenue N.W.
Washington, D. C. 20036
Dear Bob:
Burt Harrison tells me that you have copies of a
1968 Directory and Yearbook of Educational Broad¬
casting which would be an excellent source to use
in addressing correspondence to non-commercial
educational and public radio station licensees.
Would you please send me one, billing me at my
home address, if charges are considered proper
for CPB.
Having received a phoned invitation from Richard
Catalano to attend a meeting near New York City
on educational radio research at sessions sched¬
uled for October 22-24, inclusive, I anticipate
seeing you again shortly.
Cordially yours.
am :m
